name: T.B - The crime begins
description:
Tuya is a very determined and hardworking girl with a touch of kleptomania. That's why she wants to be the best at the history presentations. To accomplish this, she breaks into a museum to steal artefacts for her display. Will she be able to get the objects and have the best presentation or will she fail?

Install instruction

Unzip the zip file and extract all files. Files should remain in the folder. You only need to double-click T.B. exe to get started. You're now all set. Have fun and enjoy :)
